resources.string: Shortcuts are not supported in this device!

Leave blank to use the default URL
Leave blank to use the default model
e.g. Translate into Chinese: {INPUT_CONTENT}. {INPUT_CONTENT} is the expression respent the input source text.
You do not need to include the prompt text for Tango Assistant; instead, opt for selecting the system role message.
Tap the icon on the right to choose a message
Copy from SD Card to here
Data Import Summary Total: %1$d Imported: %2$d Skipped: %3$d
Maximum database size: %1$sGB, current database size %2$s
The following dictionaries failed to load: %1$s
Disable Image Invert in Dark Mode
Bottom bar icons on floating window
Tap here to close the floating window, swipe left or right to resize the floating window, swipe up or down to scroll the content in the floating window
Foreground service is needed for PC Console and floating button.
This notification stays as a sign that the foreground service of DictTango app is working well.
Speak with TTS if no audio resouce
Ocr dependencies cannot be downloaded due to low device storage
Bottom bar icons on main query window
Bottom bar icons on reading modey window
Before using prompts from this AI provider, it is necessary to add AI services.
App is about to exit due to unexpected fatal error
Do you want DictTango to access the SD Card? DictTango is able to access the dictionary files in the sd cards and share the dictionary with other apps after this permission is granted.
Rebuilding index for dictionary file update
Moving dictionaries out of the default group is not permitted
This operation will clear the last marked reading position in reading mode.
Click here to start word lookup
Are you sure to clear the dictionary indexes?
The are some dictionaries in the list that store in the SD card but you did not grant DictTango the permission to access them, do you want to remove them from the list or grant permission?.
The are some dictionaries in the list that store in the SD card, start from Android 11, all the app files must store under the app internal folder %1$s, do you want to remove them from the list?
Are you sure to clear the dictionary cache?
Are you sure to clear the search history?
Exit DictTango? This action will exit the app instead of minimizing the app window.
If the current group has a set brief dictionary, removing the brief dictionary will result in the inability to obtain briefs
Are you sure to remove all the words in the screen?
If the audio resource list is empty, the app will automatically switch to TTS (Text-to-Speech) pronunciation
Are you sure to remove dictionary group \"%s\"?
This operation removes the dictionary from the app but doesn\'t delete the actual dictionary files.
If the deleted group was the current search group, the default group will become the new current group.
Are you sure to remove the selected \"%s\"?
If you are currently viewing dictionary content, you need to reload the content for the font changes to take effect
Are you sure to remove the word \"%s\"?
You need to restart this app to apply the change, do you want to close the app now?

Starting from Android 11, all apps require additional file system management permissions to access all files in external storage.
 You can load dictionary files into DictTango using the following methods:
 1) Use the "Granted Dictionary" feature to access specific folders. Please note that using "Granted Dictionary" may introduce some performance issues due to limitations within the Android system itself, which cannot be resolved.
 2) Use another file management app to copy the dictionary files to DictTango's internal app folder.
 3) Enable "PC Console" and upload dictionaries to DictTango from your computer.
 
 Do you want to grant DictTango additional file system management permissions to access all files in external storage?
Are you sure to delete this %1$s?
The current group has no dictionary
%1$d dictionaries have been added to group %2$s.
Dictionary has been added to group %1$s.
File exists, do you want to replace the existing file?
The file/folder will be permanently deleted.
%1$d word entries found, it took %2$d seconds to completed the search
All the current data will be clear before importing, are you sure to continue?
Dictionary info files have been created successfully, the file name is DictionaryFileName.info.json
Invalid DICT_OCR prompt text, expect "Language Code|{INPUT_CONTENT}"
Deleting the Default Group is not allowed
PC Console only works with WIFI connected, are you sure to start it?
Press and hold for more options
The app will be restarted to apply the change
Scan completed, total %1$d dictionaries were found
Search box animation has been disabled
Search box animation has been enabled
The number of entries is greater than %1$s, the app might crash and it require a large amount of SD Card space for indexing, are you sure to continue?
Word %1$s is not found in dictionary %2$s
Zoom in mode activated, tap on the content and move your finger to view
This application cannot run because it does not have the camera permission. The application will now exit.

By accessing the PC console from your computer\'s browser, and you can manage your files and dictionaries, you can also look up words. You can still access the PC Console after you exit the app when it run as service
You can still access the PC Console after you exit the app when it run as service.
Access to the camera is needed for detection
The app requires permission to access SDCard in order to scanning dictionary, download dictionary and export setting. \n\nPlease press \"Allow\" on the permission window appears.

DictTango requires permission to draw over other apps before it can show the floating button on the screen.\n\nPlease press \"Grant Permission\" and ensure that \"Permit drawing over other apps\" is enabled for DictTango app.
Auto backup app data, the backup directory is %1$s
Include the Chinese from unicode extension
Refresh Chinese mapping table, only required when user update the user mapping file
User Chinese mapping table (.dic), format: S Chinese|T Chinese
Block the dictionary from connecting external network
Capture the clipboard text when in the word lookup mode
Search both the simplified and traditional Chinese entries for the Chinese word lookup
Display a pop-up window to show the definition when click on the word in the main window
Use two fingers to swipe upwards to collapse the dictionary content, applicable only to list view
Combine the simplified and traditional Chinese entries for the Chinese word lookup
Only display the online dictionary when word is not found
Cache the dictionary resource file such javascript, css, image etc.
Allow tapping on the edge to flip the page, only available in reading mode and sliding view
When looking up words, exact matching helps improve word lookup speed
If excluded, "in sight" and "insight" are considered different words; otherwise, they are considered the same word.
The word contains the following characters will not be display in the list of word search
Auto adjust the width of the unstyled image
When this option is enabled, you can press the back key to return to the previous word
Only expand selected dictionary and collapse others
Display the new entry in floating window when user click on the entry hyperlink in main window
Tap on image to view it with other app
All the message from the web view console will pop out
Display current dictionary name watermark on the bottom right
Enable background color in list view when not in dark mode
Display the bottom tool bar in the floating window
Enable background color in non-dark mode
Dynamic color can generate individualized schemes through wallpaper selection
Show & hide toolbar when scrolling on the dictionary content
The text in the search box will move to the center smoothly when swiping up the content
Display Smart Viewer menu item in the text selection context menu
Display TTS menu item in the text selection context menu
Customize the fallback font of the user interface by particular font file
Display background color in non-dark mode
Dark Mode Type for Web View
Allow tapping to flip the page
View entry link in floating window
" Press back key once more to quit"
Search or type web add address
Sort home menus by click count
Storage Access Framework is currently not available.
Please grant read and write permissions for external storage.
Please select internal storage with path: %s
Please select SD card with path: %s
To grant storage access, please firstly select root path of internal storage.
To grant storage access, please firstly select root path of internal storage, located in %s
To grant storage access, please firstly select root path of SD card.
To grant storage access, please firstly select root path of SD card, located in %s
Now you can select any folders under %s
Storage access has been granted for %s
You have no write access to this storage, thus selecting this folder is useless. Would you like to grant access to this storage by selecting its root path?
Storage permission was disabled permanently. Do you want to enable it from system settings?
Start downloading file, please do not leave this screen before the downloading is completed.

Convert Simplified Chinese to Hong Kong Traditional Chinese
Convert Simplified Chinese to Taiwan Traditional Chinese
Convert Traditional Chinese to Simplified Chinese
Recognize text within the dictionary image.
Convert Hong Kong Traditional Chinese to Simplified Chinese
Run JavaScript scripts in a sandbox
Convert Taiwan Traditional Chinese to Simplified Chinese

To upload from PC, please enable the Foreground Service and PC Console
Use system color scheme in dark mode
Visit %1$s from your computer\'s browser, take noted that PC Console only works with WIFI connected
